value.name: IISc Researchers Develop A Cheaper Way To Create Metal Powders For 3D Printing
value.description: IISc researchers have managed to address this issue with the help of a discarded waste product dubbed swarf -- something that’s left during the metal grinding process

value.name: Meta refuses to give up on crypto space, looking at in-app tokens, NFTs: Report
value.description: Meta is yet to completely distance itself from blockchain products as it is also looking into sharing NFTs on Facebook.

value.name: AI That Scans X-Rays For Abnormalities Without Humans Approved For Use In EU
value.description: In a statement, Oxipit revealed that the AI tool is called ChestLink and is able to scan chest X-rays and later send reports to patients about any abnormalities

value.name: Tryst 2022: No-Code Software Development Platform Graphite GTC Partners With IIT Delhi Tech Fest
value.description: The first edition of Tryst s Fintech Summit will be held with keynote speaker Shashwat Nakrani, Co-founder of BharatPe.

value.name: Samsung mega sale Carnival, grab exciting offers on home appliances for Eid
value.description: Consumer electronics brand Samsung is offering range of offers and promotional prices on its TV, refrigerator, washing machine, microwave oven, and air conditioner to the occasion of Eid-ul-Fitr,

value.name: This Ethereum change could make or break crypto ecosystem
value.description: Ethereum is set to make the biggest change in its near-decade history, an event that’s certain to ripple through the entire ecosystem of cryptocurrencies and digital assets.

value.name: Google Play Store will soon stop showing outdated apps to Android users
value.description: Google has announced that it will soon start hiding the apps that are out of date and not up to the security standards of Play Store.

value.name: Pinterest bans climate misinformation; find out how Google, Meta, Twitter battle deniers
value.description: Pinterest has introduced a comprehensive policy to combat misleading information and claims around climate change on its platform. It will remove content that denies the existence of impacts of

value.name: Meta is working on virtual coins for its apps that employees have nicknamed 'Zuck Bucks', a report says
value.description: The virtual currency is unlikely to be a cryptocurrency but will rather be in the form of in-app tokens that rewards users, including influencers.

value.name: Ozone heating Earth more than previously thought, says study
value.description: The deep and rapid warming in the Southern Ocean affects its role as one of the main regions for soaking up excess heat as the planet warms, they said.

value.name: FBI disrupts Russian hackers, takes away control of routers and firewall appliances
value.description: "Fortunately, we were able to disrupt this botnet before it could be used,” US Attorney General Merrick Garland was quoted as saying by the Reuters news agency.

value.name: SpaceX's application to scale up its rocket launch site in Texas has been put on ice by the US Army, reports say
value.description: The US Army Corps told SpaceX that it failed to provide requested information for the permit, including environmental data on wetlands, per Bloomberg.
